/usr/bin/c++  -lGL -lX11 -lpthread -lXrandr -lXi -ldl -lharfbuzz pkg-config --cflags freetype2   CMakeFiles/program.dir/src/glad.c.o CMakeFiles/program.dir/src/render/font.cpp.o CMakeFiles/program.dir/src/render/shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/program.dir/src/render/sprite.cpp.o CMakeFiles/program.dir/src/render/text2d.cpp.o CMakeFiles/program.dir/src/render/texture2d.cpp.o CMakeFiles/program.dir/src/render/tile_map_renderer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/program.dir/src/render/vertex_array.cpp.o  -o program   -L/home/marcelk/projects/../Lib/glfw/build/src  -L/home/marcelk/projects/../Lib/freetype-2/build  -Wl,-rpath,/home/marcelk/projects/../Lib/glfw/build/src:/home/marcelk/projects/../Lib/freetype-2/build -lglfw3 -lfreetype
